text: alm tar 'ana allah 'anzal min alsama' ma', fsqyna bih ashjarana fi alard, fa'akhrajna man tilk al'ashjar thamarat mkhtlfana alwanha, minha al'ahmar waminha al'aswad walasfr waghayr dhlk? wkhalaqna min aljibal tarayiq bydana whmrana mkhtlfana alwanha, wakhalaqna min aljibal jbala shadidat alswad
